In England, in the seven days to 28 February, there were 45,839 new confirmed cases (81.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 February, there were 66,019 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 31% (20,180 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 March is 3,684,724 (6,546.3 cases per 100,000 population).
